title: New "Brash" Exploit Crashes Chromium Browsers Instantly with a Single Malicious URL
description: A severe vulnerability disclosed in Chromium's Blink rendering engine can be exploited to crash many Chromium-based browsers within a few seconds. Security researcher Jose Pino, who disclosed details of the flaw, has codenamed it Brash.
